name: tomasborsje.github.io
description: This website was built with React with additional support for multiple self-contained apps on sub-pages.

name: Duskfall
description: A Minecraft MMORPG plugin, built on Spigot. Includes support for data-driven items, mobs, recipes, and an MMORPG code layer above Spigot's.

name: Rain Worldle
description: Guess from a list of Rain World characters, changing daily! Inspired by New York Times's 'Wordle', and hosted on /rainworldle.

name: Aetherium
description: Terraria mod for tModLoader, written in C#. Adds a few unique items + a boss fight.

name: VoxelGame
description: A Minecraft clone created in Unity with C#. Has support for procedural world generation, crafting, saving + loading, and more.

name: LeagueBot
description: A computer-vision powered bot that also uses the League of Legends API to play the game. Written in C#.

name: TetrisGym
description: An OpenAI 'gym' set up for machine learning agents to learn the popular game Tetris.
